channel.title: v1.1.2 on Longhorn Manual Test Cases
channel.description: Recent content in v1.1.2 on Longhorn Manual Test Cases

item.title: Test Frontend Payload Data When Resource Not Updated
item.description: Related issue https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn/issues/2646 https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn/issues/2591 Test Frontend Payload Data Given 1 PVC/Pod created. When monitor traffic in frontend pod with browser inspect tool. Then wait for 3 mins And should see empty data list in volume payloads. Example: https://github.com/longhorn/longhorn-manager/pull/905#issuecomment-851391374
